title: Proposal to Use CAKE in Farms in Place of BNB
body:
Greeting fellow pancake holders. This proposal of mine can change CAKE going forward so please listen.

# Current Situation:
* The Pool's APY for CAKE is continuously going down.
* We now have **very high supply of CAKE in Pool**.
* The best return you can get on your cake is from Pool.
* There are **only 3 farms that use CAKE** token.

# Now, the Idea is:
To use CAKE instead of BNB in farms (Current of upcoming Farm XXX-BNB can be replaced with XXX-CAKE).

# What Impact will it have on CAKE:
* This **will not change CAKE emission** at all.
* Will **create more options** in farms for CAKE holders to participate into. 
* Will **reduce CAKE supply in Pools** as part of this will now be in farms with competitive APYs.
* Lower CAKE supply in Pool will **increase Pool's APY**.
choices: Yes, Use CAKE in current and upcoming Farms.
Yes,  Use CAKE in upcoming Farms, keeping current farms unchanged.
author: 0x580145A510d402D312B2acED225c2F5526C0cDBD
